New Records: The Celtics made 29 of 61 threes in a game
Key Match Events: The Knicks shot 55 percent from the field, but still got blown out
The Celtics spent the last six minutes of the game missing 13-straight threes trying to break the single-game record

The Knicks will have to give themselves a chance by shooting a lot of threes
Post-Match Reflections: The Knicks were embarrassed by Boston on opening night
The Celtics aren't some sort of political dictator, they're just a math teacher, and handed the Knicks this open-response question for homework
